C

calculateScoreWinner() - Method in class model.SnakesAndLadders
Calculate the winner's score pre: a player must have won the game pre: the player 'temp' must to be the winner post: Calculate the winner's score
changeActual() - Method in class model.SnakesAndLadders
Current player swaps position with next player pre: there must be at least two players: the current one and the next post: the player switched positions with the next player
container() - Method in class model.Node
Shows the content of the nodes including the players
pre: the nodes must have been created
createGame() - Method in class ui.Menu
User enters game parameters
pre: the number of rows and columns has to be greater than 2 pre: the sum of the number of snakes and ladders must not be greater than half the rows on the game board post: Tthe game board is created according to the parameters entered by the user
createGameBoard(int, int) - Method in class model.SnakesAndLadders
Create the game board
pre: The parameters must to be positive integers post: Create the game board size: rowsAmount*colsAmount and prints the the game board overview
createWorld(String) - Method in class ui.Menu
The game board is created and the game is initialized
pre: parameters have to be separated by spaces pre: you must have an entry for each parameter, none can be left empty post: the game table is created and the game is initialized
